text: Soni nkaliweni lyuwa ndema jalikopoka (ni kwelelaga nsana) lilinkujiwambala mbanga jaojo (ni kuwala kwakwe) chakun’dyo, sano ndema jalikutiwila (nkaliweni) lilinkwawambala (ni kuwala kwakwe) chakunchiji, kutendaga wanganyao waliji pantetete mwalakwemo. Yalakweyo ni ine mu ilosyo ya Allah (yakulosya ukombosi Wakwe). Mundu jwan’jongwele Allah, basi jwalakwe ni jwali jwakongoka, nambo jwannechelele kusokonechela nganim’ba mumpatiile nsyowe jwakun’jongola
